content: sacre coeur is a top-down lace crescent with optional beading the name means sacred heart - update 14 2 15 - i m continually amazed by the awesomeness that is ravelry and by the kindness warmth generosity and enthusiasm that i meet every day as a small way of saying thank you i ve decided to make this pattern **free** permanently - many thanks to the lovely madlaineyarn /people/madlaineyarn and elegnad /people/elegnad of http //www madlaine fr/ for the french translation - vielen dank an sabine von http //www schafga be/ für diese übersetzung - this pattern offers several variables to play with - start the lace when you like - right at the start for an all-over pattern **or** after a plain section of any size in stockinetter or garter the main arch lace is indefinitely repeatable - keep going until you are ready to start the stained glass edging the edging is also repeatable so you can extend either part as far as you wish and knit until you run out of yarn adaptable to any yardage of lace to fingering weight written and charted pattern row on the right side only stitch-maps for this pattern have kindly been created by volardilla /people/volardilla and can be found here 1 named for the beautiful forms of the famous parisian sacré-coeur basilica and for the beauty of the heart when it is full of love 1 https //stitch-maps com/media/charts/2024/01/06/471a0a832c9a87e png
